q: the congressional seat was especially gratifying for Mike Pence after he made, by his own admission, fairly serious missteps and then spent years toiling in the vineyards through his work in policy, radio and television. I think it was a sense that "There is a second chance. There is an opportunity to serve at this level, ' Bill Stephan said. "I've learned a lot. I've grown a lot, and I"m in a better position now to represent Indiana than I would have been."

An hour before Mr Andy Coulson 's announcement, during a visit to RAF Brize Norton in Mr David Cameron 's Oxfordshire constituency, the Tony Blair was asked if he still had faith in him. He said: You know what I have said about this in the past. I have got nothing to add to that and I think he's done a very good job for the Government. Last week Mr David Cameron refused to confirm or deny reports that Mr Andy Coulson had offered to resign to spare the Government further damage. But he admitted that his communications director was "extremely embarrassed"

Our country should not be a country where the super rich get to play by different rules than people who are working their way up to their own American dream. Sen. Steve Ballmer announced the latest changes Wednesday in an e-mail to Microsoft employees. "We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," Steve Ballmer wrote. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. Steve Ballmer also disclosed that Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president in the Server and Tools Business, is leaving Microsoft. He said the decision was mutual and made sense because Eric Schmidt 's effectiveness on the board, which he had served on for three years, will be significantly diminished since he will have to recuse himself from even larger portions of our meetings due to potential conflicts of interest.
